Yoink 2.5 – Simplifies drag and drop between Spaces and fullscreen apps.

Every time you start dragging a file, Yoink fades in a tiny window on the left edge of your screen so you can drag files to it. This frees up your mouse so you can comfortably navigate to the destination of the drop and resume the drag from Yoink,s window.   WHAT,S NEW Version 2.5… Read More »
